website_summaries.verdict: Attractively designed, and arrives with more pieces than just a faucet.
pros: Consistently regarded for its quality and craftsmanship, this faucet set can instantly upgrade your bathroom
Comes with a faucet and shower head with some swivel to it
Can make even a 20-year old bathroom feel fresh again
cons: Designed to fit Moen valves, and while it may fit other manufacturers, it won't fit all

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Set
customer_reviews.text: I liked this set very much. We bought it to replace the one we currently had becuasebthe water was not going up anymore, now it is not a problem and the shower head actually has a lot of pressure! My sister and I actually started installing it and it was fairly easy with the help of the instructions but ultimately my dad finished it off for us, he has more experience. In terms of design it is very beautiful very shiny and the 3 pieces look beautiful together.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: Husband went through great pain and sorrow to install this. To top it off the faucet sticks out too far and when you run water through the faucet it comes out of the shower head at the same time. And one one more co.plaint it was missing a major screw to it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best Value for Quality
customer_reviews.text: Moen does it again! I have five bathrooms......and yes, I get to clean all of them. While the master does not have this fixture it does boast a very expensive Moen upgrade over one thousand dollars. I say this because the Brantford looks expensive, cleans easily and many friends have commented on how beautiful it is. The Brantford collection has many accessory items such as hooks, bars etc. You will love the Brantford - it operates accurately and installs easily. I own three of them and I'm sold. Hope you are too.
customer_reviews.author: John Graham

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find a shower trim to match our old valve system so we didn't need a plumber. We are not exactly handy, but are unafraid to give things a try. This installed fairly easily. The tub spout is heavy, we had to use clear silicone/caulk to get a better seal. However the old tub spouts distributor had a hissing sound that this spout fixes. As others mentioned the temperature knob is not flush, but that is true for most of the products I saw at the box store. It looks fine to me. The water pressure could be stronger, but I think that about all shower heads.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These look nice installed. We had some additional tub problems that we found when we were going to install them, so we ended up hiring someone. They actually installed it after finishing their work, so I can’t really speak to ease of installation. They didn’t look too hard though and I’m confident we could have done it had there been no additional issues found.
customer_reviews.author: Britt WT

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far! Looks and feels fantastic. Seems like heavy brass was used everywhere except for the shower head. The head is plastic (with matching chrome finish) and has only 1 spray setting. I Highly recommend this product, but expect to purchase another shower head for more options.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Good Tub & Shower Fixture. Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This show set is a very nice set for the price. We installed two of them in our rental unit and both are holding up well. Very inexpensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it cost twice as much as I paid easy to use
customer_reviews.author: joanne costello

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Was able to complete a renovation without spending a fortune, but the finished product looks so much more expensive than it actually is. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Momma_of_4

customer_reviews.title: Nice Upgrade Style
customer_reviews.text: Chrome finish, very stylish look. Gives your shower a WOW factor. Replaced my old Moen system that was 16 years old. Fit prefect.
customer_reviews.author: T ROB

customer_reviews.title: Adapters not included are expensive
customer_reviews.text: These units do not have all the installation fittings you need. Had to buy a $70 installation kit to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Shower Power
customer_reviews.text: The new fixtures transformed the look of my bathroom. They look high end, yet didn't have a high end price tag. Bought a set for each shower.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: These matched the trim kits in our new home. Great value and identical to what we already have.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The showerhead has only one setting. Other than that, it looks nice for a used product.
customer_reviews.author: America

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, non-included valve is expensive
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful faucet set. I read that it needed a valve, but didnt realize the valve was $86.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Anna Truelove

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shower / tub set up. They look really good and work great. We just made sure it was the right valvue set up. We are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great, solid, beautiful chrome 3 piece set at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Ann

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Trim for Moen Shower/Tub set. Looks beautiful. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: is beautiful but I purchased the wrong color, so haven't used this item yet, but will
customer_reviews.author: Kristine S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; mechanical parts meh
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar experience to reviewer Teaisbetter. Fixtures look fantastic, but valve has a flimsy plastic part that won't hold together. Currently using it Irish-engineered. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: H. J. Westerfield

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking set
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but have not finished nor started bath remodel
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Don't  purchase if you have old plumbing
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and the price, put when my handyman tried to put it on my plumbing didn't match because my plumbing was to old
customer_reviews.author: Elena Costabilo

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Shower head is a smidge on the small side but looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Conley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, haven't installed it, Will let you know how I like it
customer_reviews.author: G. Crewell

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I DID REPLACE MY 17 YEARS OLD TUB AND SHOWER TRIM KIT. I DID REUSE EXISTING VALVE. I AM VERY HAPPY WITH PRICE VS QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenate Trim
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent way to change out and upgrade the shower and tub trim in two of my bathrooms. Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Zekintha

customer_reviews.title: Check fit
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the shower plate is the right fit for ur shower or else you will be screwed
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value, a trusted brand what else can you ask.
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and really improves the look of the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Karl K.

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS TODAY!!!I
customer_reviews.text: I just received and installed my new diverters and spouts. It looks like I have a brand new bathroom! I replaced them in all my bathrooms -- after the first one, the other installs took about 5 minutes. I am truly shocked at the difference it makes!
customer_reviews.author: vlmillard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't what we needed and sent it back easily
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Armer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I needed to update my bathrooms and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I needed to update my bathrooms and I bought two sets. Slip on faucet was easy to install, heavy metal faucet handle and a great shower head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It compliments my home's other Moen faucets
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It compliments my home's other Moen faucets
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: They look as good in person as they do on here
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for plumbers to install as part of a bathroom remodel. They look as good in person as they do on here. Will work as long as your have a posi temp valve installed already.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: This set works ok, and looks good. The posi-temp valve keeps temperature constant if someone turns on another tap or flushes the toilet. Some plastic, some metal...wish it was all metal.
customer_reviews.author: JAH

customer_reviews.title: I love it but I can't use the faucet because we're ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but I can't use the faucet because we're I goes on the half in pipe the screw stripped out
customer_reviews.author: Broadway

customer_reviews.title: empty shell
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with the expensive parts needed. Cheaper to buy an acutal set with all parts.
customer_reviews.author: BROWNCOW21

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you check diameter of your pipes first. ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check diameter of your pipes first. The chrome plate and lever that controls water flow/hot/cold did not fit my shower. Had no idea it was not just a common size. Past the return date
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts instead of metal
customer_reviews.text: This product is cheaply made. The drain assembly and shower head are made of plastic and look terrible. The drain broke right off a week after we had installed it. You are better off buying plumbing supplies at a plumbing store. Our contractor told us that stores like Home Depot and Lowes carry lesser quality parts (for example, plastic instead of metal) and unfortunately now we have figured out that Amazon does too. Nearly every building supply part we have ordered from Amazon has been defective or inferior in some way. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

product_meta.title: Moen T2153 Brantford Posi-Temp Pressure Balancing Tub and Shower Trim Kit Valve Required, Chrome
product_meta.description:
Moen T2153 Brantford Tub and Shower Faucet Set with shower handle, single-spray shower head and bathtub faucet, Chrome (Valve Not Included)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Brantford collection features a traditional style giving your home a beautiful look and timeless appeal. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.
feature_bullets: VERSATILE DESIGN: Chrome finish is highly reflective for a mirror-like look that works with any decorating style
VALVE REQUIRED: This trim kit requires valve # 2510, 2520, 2570, or 2590 to complete installation
LONGSTANDING FLEXIBILITY: Built on the Moen M-PACT common valve system, allowing you to update the faucet style in the future without replacing any plumbing
PRESSURE BALANCING: Posi-Temp valve (sold separately) helps maintain water pressure and temperature even when other water sources in the house are in use
COORDINATING COLLECTION: Coordinates with other faucets and accessories in the Brantford Collection
ADA COMPLIANT: Complies with Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) specifications
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
